Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: If your playing lots, and dont have too many utxos the `cleanwallettransactions` RPC in by dev fork will work fine for all high transaction nodes.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: As having to rewrite the wallet to somehting that actually handles high amount od txs is just about impossible, I just made it remove transaction history in runtime,instead.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: Very simple, and very effective.
